body: Well, this is why you shouldn't read hentai

Ok i got it both Mochizuki are different (or different timelines)because at the end of the second series she goes to a highschool with both girls and boys Student's in the first one she goes to an all boys school to work plus the boy she likes has different hair and there names slightly different.
👎👎👎👎👎👎 only the last story is good
Is this the same teacher from that 'Boku to Misaki sensei' henai?
Jibril enough with your jibirish and fap to it

That she could finally be a teacher since she will be with inui until he graduates so the story doesnt end there and that i hope the author of this manga would continue mochizuki sensei teaching training but it wouldn't be called that so basically all i want is a sequel of that story

Wait so are all these the same mochizuki since all of the stories are different and are inui and inoue the same person they are both from 
class B so the story after the first short story it went to the part when she actually becomes a teacher? So is when she was a teacher in training the first part and mochizuki's secret is the second part? The teacher in training part made me overjoyed since 
inui x mochizuki sensei was great and i like that ending but this story would be easier to understand if it was in chronological order which is not happening since its skipping to different time so are these mochizuki/other mochizuki and inui/inoue the same people or are these something advanced like these are totally different realities. Bcuz i didnt like mochizuki secret at all the shota's were fugly as hell and mochizuki sensei teaching training wasnsuch a great story and the ending shouldnt really be considered as an ending since inui was only a first year and at the end she was happy

can't believe is already translated... been waiting since I saw the raw a few years ago..
thx a lot to the translating team and the uploader
so glad to see this FINALLY fully translated!
